#summary Description of parameters

==General parameters==

===Obligatory parameters=== 

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Possible values* || *Related parameter(s)* || *See also* || 
|| `index` || Location of the Lemur/Indri index || || || || 
|| `model` || Association finding model. || `1` = Model 1 <br> `2` = Model 2 || || [Models] ||
|| `associationFile` || File with document-entity associations || || `associationFileFormat` || GeneratingAssociations || 

===Optional parameters===
|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Possible values* || *See also* || 
|| `associationFileFormat` || Format of the association file || `0` (default), `1`, `2`, or `3` || FileFormats ||  


  * *entityAliasMapping*: obligatory, when associationFileFormat is set to 2 or 3. This file defines a mapping of `EntityAlias` values to `EntityID`-s. See EntityRepresentation for details.


  * smoothingMethod
  * smoothingParam
  * assocFile
  * queryFile
  * runID
  * outputFile
  * resultNum

Notes:
  * `DOCNO` denotes the external document ID 
  * `" "` (space) denotes whitespace
  * `weight` is a non-negative numeric value (integer or real)
...
